project.name: TeX
project.description: The TeX project maintains ebuilds for TeX distributions and TeX related packages.

longdescription.p: The TeX project maintains ebuilds for TeX distributions and TeX related packages. This includes app-text/texlive, app-text/tetex, the dev-texlive category, most of dev-tex and a few others.

body.p: Bugs, bugs, bugs! If you want to help, consider going through the TeX bug list: http://tiny.cc/2padew. Any comment that can help a bug get fixed is always useful!
To get in contact with the TeX team, drop by #gentoo-tex and chat with us, or send us an email at tex@gentoo.org.

project.resource: How to migrate from teTeX or TeX Live 2005 to TeX Live 2007.
